channel.title: KSC:005930 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in KSC:005930 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Future of AI in Your Home According to Samsung
item.description: Samsung is looking to deepen connectivity across its devices and appliances with its open ecosystem SmartThings, which has over 400 million users to date. Bloomberg Tech: Asia anchor Shery Ahn speaks
